originalText.text: My kitty did some morning parkour and spilled a ton of candle wax on herself. The team at UrVetCare was able to check her skin and remove all the wax from her. Thank you so so much!

text.text: My kitty did some morning parkour and spilled a ton of candle wax on herself. The team at UrVetCare was able to check her skin and remove all the wax from her. Thank you so so much!

originalText.text:
This new veterinary office is gorgeous. The staff is warm and welcoming, and Dr. Kutscher speaks dog fluently. I wanted to try them out before leaving our old vet, and I was sold after watching Dr. K spend hours with my dog, on the floor, outside, in the back, trying to figure out what was causing her limp. I feel like she truly listened to my concerns, and finally, my girl is in good hands and on the road to recovery.

Bonus - the owner, Aimee, is lovely. This is a family-owned business which is so refreshing. The office is adorably glam, and I learned it was decorated by Aimee's daughter! I even got the name of the woman who photographed the cool pet art.

originalText.text: I waited to post until my third visit here (I live very close by so I wanted it to work for convenience). They always have availability which is great and they’re wonderful with my pup. However - they have billed me wrong several times (I’ve had to catch the mistake myself), they messed up a prescription pickup and have separately prescribed the wrong amount of food for my dog. The receptionists are either wonderful or horrible with attitude. I’ve ended up more stressed out than before entering each time. Absolutely steer clear or be ready to triple check everything.

originalText.text: "Bow WOW WOW!" I can't say enough about this practice. No one knows what our four legged family members are thinking but URvet Care Tribeca does. The philosophy is to administer fear-free treatment. My senior chihuahua (13) has always disliked the vet and now he stops by their door every time we walk by for some pets and treats. The staff is friendly and accommodating. We just had the annual physical with Dr. Kutscher. She is a delight to work with and takes the time to explain any concerns or issues. We went to another practice in the neighborhood for years but had no hesitations making a change. Urvet Care Tribeca is a home (dog) run!

originalText.text: have been taking my older rescue here since we got her in July.  they have been nothing but kind and professional. they have stayed late to handle her multiple emergencies and checked in with me to see how she is doing.  They are friendly and compassionate and provide great care and highly recommend.
